flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Learn how simple it is to make Sesame Street party hats for any fan, young or old,
guide.introduction_rendered: Learn how simple it is to make Sesame Street party hats for any fan, young or old,
guide.summary: These paper Sesame Street character party hats doubled as 1st birthday party hats for our son, Aiden Douglas, (10/25/10) and Halloween 2011. Our pumpkins were carved to add to the festivities.
guide.title: Halloween 2011
